data.title: Opening Ceremonies
data.meta_description: Each year the College invites distinguished guest speakers to the Opening Ceremonies for the Bruges and the Natolin (Warsaw) campuses. Guest speakers have included:
data.text:
2022-2023

Ms Roberta METSOLA, President of the European Parliament (Bruges)

» read more...

Mr Alexander de Croo, Prime Minister of Belgium (Bruges)

» read more...
